bioconda.name: pyfaidx
bioconda.summary: pyfaidx: efficient pythonic random access to fasta subsequences

biocontainers.name: pyfaidx
biocontainers.summary: This python module implements pure python classes for indexing, retrieval, and in-place modification of fasta files using a samtools compatible index.

biotools.summary: This python module implements pure Python classes for indexing, retrieval, and in-place modification of FASTA files using a samtools compatible index.

bioschemas.name: pyfaidx
bioschemas.summary: This python module implements pure Python classes for indexing, retrieval, and in-place modification of FASTA files using a samtools compatible index.
